item.title: Continuous Integration with Travis-CI
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: Lets take a look at using Travis-CI for continuous integration specifically to track the build status for our node projects on GitHub.

item.title: Node.js testing with Mocha, Chai, Sinon & Proxyquire
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: Lets take a look at testing node.js using a few popular tools and frameworks for running and writing tests.
